Stablecoin is one of the few crypto narratives to achieve true product–market fit, driving the fastest adoption for TradeFi and institutions.

@stbl_official is here to define the next phase of stablecoin narrative

$STBL is the next evolution of stablecoins, separating yield and principal so users can enjoy utility without giving up their earnings.

🔎  Key Highlights:

➡️  Reeve Collins, the mind behind Tether, the first stablecoin that reshaped crypto, is back with a new creation: $STBL.

➡️  Stablecoins haven’t really changed in 10 years. 

It’s always been the same cycle: Deposit → Mint → Peg.

With $STBL, when you mint, you don’t just get 1 token, you get 2 assets:

👉  $USST → your stablecoin
👉  $YLD → an NFT that captures all the yield from your collateral

➡️  This changes the game: 

You can spend your stablecoin anytime, while your yield keeps earning. No more trade-off between liquidity and returns; you get both.

➡️  Backed by real assets: 

Think tokenized Treasuries and money market funds like Franklin Templeton’s BENJI and Ondo’s USDY. TradFi isn’t just dipping its toes anymore; it’s fully on-chain.

➡️  Unlocking RWA Liquidity

$STBL turns tokenized treasuries & RWAs into USST stablecoin + YLD yield. TradFi assets now flow into DeFi, liquidity and returns, no compromise.

➡️ TGE COMING SOON while momentum is Building Fast

Already secured a $500M institutional minting commitments.

Disclaimer - we have a partnership with STBL so please don’t forget to do your own research.

In Canada the police say if you have a home invader  do NOT take matters into your own hands, but instead to call 911 & wait. 

Florida says, if you have a home invader by all means shoot them! 

Which do you think would be more effective?
A ton of Gold and Silver calls traded, both metals near their recent highs

$AVGO Broadcom jumped about 12% premarket  after fiscal third quarter results beat estimates, and the company revealed a new customer. "The new customer (OpenAI) provides an immediate step function in revenue with the $10B order just the beginning of the engagement."

$IOT Samsara shares rose 12% after the internet of things company posted fiscal second-quarter results and guidance that topped expectations.

For the period ending Aug. 2, Samsara said it earned an adjusted $0.12 per share as revenue surged 30.4% Y/Y
$BILL Bill Holdings Shares jumped 8% following a report that activist investor Starboard Value has built an 8% stake in the financial automation software firm and may seek board representation.

$LULU Lululemon Athletica fell 19% after the retailer posted mixed Q2 results and slashed its FY2025 outlook. EPS exceeded expectations, but revenue came in below guidance, pressured by weak U.S. sales, tariffs, and product execution challenges.
$BRZE Braze +21% – Shares surged after the software firm beat Q2 estimates with 24% revenue growth and issued upbeat guidance. For Q3, Braze expects revenue of $183.5M–$184.5M +21% Y/Y
$GWRE Guidewire Software Non-GAAP EPS of $0.84 beats by $0.21, revenue of $356.6M beats by $18.75M

On US Labor Supply:

The primary pushback against weak headline jobs (& given immigration/labor supply dynamics) would be chart below which should not be subject to large distortion.   

Prime-age Employment to Population Ratio remains steady and actually ticked back towards cycle/multi-decade highs.  In isolation = labor supply falling faster than labor demand.

Robinhood $HOOD and AppLovin $APP have been added to the S&P 500 alongside Emcor $EME.
Amazon $AMZN is trading a slight discount to the Nasdaq 100 $QQQ on a forward earnings basis, after trading at a substantial premium for the last two decades.
Nvidia $NVDA guided for its largest ever sequential increase in revenue in Q3 at ~$7.3 billion QoQ.

OpenAI is set to produce its first AI chip next year with Broadcom $AVGO, per the FT, with plans to put the chip to use internally rather than selling it to external customers. 

$NVDA $AMD

Broadcom $AVGO CEO Hock Tan:

“Last quarter, one of these prospects released production orders to Broadcom, and we have accordingly characterized them as a qualified customer for XPUs, and in fact, have secured over $10 billion of orders of AI racks based on our XPUs.”
